Reviews.Title: Great Laptop...However Picture is different than what actually came.
Reviews.Author: Alexandria Fudge
Reviews.Content: I love Dell Laptops and decided to purchase a new one on here. The only thing that I have a problem is the fact that the laptop that is shown in the pictures shows that the laptop has a CD drive but mine did not come with one. I now know not to go off what I see in the picture because the picture is just something to draw you in more.

Reviews.Title: No DVD drive
Reviews.Author: Andy4LSU
Reviews.Content: Beware! No DVD drive built in. I had to buy an external DVD drive after the fact. Other than that, nice running machine.

Reviews.Title: Please stay away from this laptop
Reviews.Author: Christian De Freitas
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop at a local store, the trackpad didnt work reliably after a few days, changed the laptop now the wireless card is faulty. i'm returning this laptop and saw a toshiba with nice specs here at amazon that i'll be buying http://amzn.to/1fXsxf9

Reviews.Title: no dvd drive misleading photo
Reviews.Author: Marvin Alexis
Reviews.Content: Misleading photo, no optical drive. One would think that if there is no optical drive then the product specification would say "None" and not "N/A". First bad experience shopping at amazon.

Reviews.Title: Deceiving Advertisement
Reviews.Author: Ethicha Crespo
Reviews.Content: The product pictures, as well as the product information/quick guide in the box lists an optical drive/DVD player, but it does not have one.  definitely false advertising and deceiving to get you to order.  Shame because up to now I had nothing but good ratings for all my previous orders.  This was a disappointing Birthday present!! :-(

Reviews.Title: New Inspiron + Windows 8.1 = New computing adventures
Reviews.Author: Kathlene R. Warner "bookie"
Reviews.Content: Moving from an eight year old XP system to the new computer plus Windows 8.1 is not for the faint of heart.  The hardware is great. Clean construction/design. Everything is as promised.  The software should come with Valium.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: David C.
Reviews.Content: I really didn't need a laptop but decided to get one anyways i enjoy using this i did switch it over to run like windows 7

Reviews.Title: Great laptop but no cd driver
Reviews.Author: Ruben P.
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent machine but I asked if it had cd driver and I was told yes. It's a shame.I recommend to buy an external cd/dvd unit along with this inspiron.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Kim Law
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this laptop....I do my college course work on it! It's super fast! User friendly and the touch screen is so cool!

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 15.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop
Reviews.Author: Eileen Cooper
Reviews.Content: I have not used the laptop much.  The tiles for Windows 8 take some getting used to.  But like the speed and portability of the computer.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Holly Bower
Reviews.Content: Love the new computer, helped with my step sons homework and made life easier. love that it connect with my Surface

Reviews.Title: Computer
Reviews.Author: Claudia J Bouck
Reviews.Content: I have had many problems, had to wipe it clean and start over.  Not sure if it is the computer its self  or Windows 8.  It is a very touchy computer.

Reviews.Title: Like new, great price
Reviews.Author: timothyearl
Reviews.Content: For $300 works like a new laptop, best price for a newer laptop, thanks for the great service, good luck on amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jaime Goza "I am a new author. I am intereste...
Reviews.Content: This is my first Dell computer, I have always wanted one. I have had many computers before. I love this one! Like I really love it!

Reviews.Title: Best product for price
Reviews.Author: Venkat
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Son. He is very happy as this has touch screen like ipad and down load all the games and connect to xbox, and he learning typing on key board too. Microsoft done good job on touch screen laptops. Go for it best value for money.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Sandy Miranda
Reviews.Content: Beautiful design. The touch screen is so helpful. It is fairly big so maybe not a good idea to carry it around everywhere.

Reviews.Title: step daughter
Reviews.Author: jessie1955
Reviews.Content: my step daughter never had a laptop before and since my other live her so much she wanted me to order her one so it is great and she love her too.

Reviews.Title: laptop review
Reviews.Author: victor mora
Reviews.Content: i would like to say that i am 100% ok ,but there are couple things weird with the laptop,,,,The keyboard does not have light, no dvd writer so next time i hope the seller be more specific,the features says it has dvd writer ,but i wasnt true, overall is fine .

Reviews.Title: I can't believe it came with a blank cover on DVD drive!!!
Reviews.Author: Sandry Seibert
Reviews.Content: The same computer with same characteristics can be found on any ordinary store for less than this price WITH DVD drive. Now I'm trying to install software and I'm unable to do that. This seller is totally irresponsible to hide this information.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!!
Reviews.Author: Carol M.
Reviews.Content: This is a very much waste of money!!  Will get rid of this a get another kind WITHOUT THE 8!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Pentium-2127U Processor
4 GB DDR3L SDRAM
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Touch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 15.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop (i15RVT-3809BLK)
